voice.intro: My apologies, please repeat your command.

card.title: Help
card.text: I understand you need some help. At any time you can issue the following commands. To hear your options again, say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To skip past the current scene description, say "skip." To start the game over, say "start again." At any time, to hear these commands again, say "help".

voice.prompt: Now, what would you like to do?
